question: Posted By Will on February 27, 1999 at 14:44:50:Are you familiar with this drug that has been approved for use in Mexico?  Supposedly, it is designed to clear up blood leakage in the vitreous caused by diabetes, et al and is close to being approved in the US.  My question is, could this also be used to clear up other floaters, strands, or specks that can commonly occur?Thanks.
title: Vitrase
